author: bjh
msg: Get APR's misc/unix building cleanly on OS/2 using include paths to get
the correct version of header files from other APR modules. This removes
the need for a string of platform #ifdefs.

author: bjh
msg: OS/2: Sort out error handling in ap_thread_join()

author: bjh
msg: OS/2: Now that we have non-blocking pipes, set them to blocking if requested
when creating pipes to a spawned process.

author: bjh
msg: OS/2: Add a missing error code mapping
